name: Escape Game:100 Ways To Die 4
description:
“Everyday we live, we face 100 Ways to Die.”

And this time, you’ll be the one to witness every Death that Happens!
It is an awful thing to see the dumb monster die again and again and again and again...
Well, this time you’re not the one doing that, so, you’ll become his Avenger! Exciting, eh?

[ The Goal is Simple ]
* Watch closely of the crime, for you are the only witness.
* Try to find something about the killer that is unique.
* Tap the spot on him where you think can be the key evidence to identify the killer.
* Successfully identified the killer and you win.

But of course, in case you made a mistake by taking down the wrong guy, there is a Plan B.
That is, KILL HIM. LOL

The way to kill him, would be ways you’ve always found to kill the dumb monster in previous episodes.
To specify: Tap, Slide, Tilt, Blow, Shake etc. Do anything you can think of, with your device.
Warning: Please do not try throwing it away or dump it into water, it doesn’t work that way.

[ Features ]
* Creative Gameplay: One you’ve never played before.
* HELP: We support you with various ways of help, SKIP the level if you’re stuck, or maybe see a HINT and you’ll know what to do immediately.
* ALL LEVELS FREE: Levels will be updated continuously.
* Game Center: See if you can beat your friends and pass all levels.

If you have any interesting thoughts on 100 ways to die, or you just wanna make friends, feel free to contact us at: magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com

You can also like us on facebook: www.facebook.com/MagicFantasyCoop
Or follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/MagicFantasyltd

To all the players of 100 Ways to Die, we sincerely appreciate your support, if not we won’t have this chance of producing EP 4. We hope you’ll continue to do so because we would really like to continue making good games, even better games. Thank you, OOXX.
